messages.title: STANDING ASIDE
messages.content: By standing aside in this election the Green Party can be a real catalyst for change. Working in a 'Progressive Alliance' with Labour's Ruth Cadbury, we can truly challenge and work toward securing a better environment and fair society with action for all.

messages.title: FAIRER VOTING
messages.content: Fairer system where every vote counts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Your Local Green Voice at Heathrow
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop the 3rd runway at Heathrow. Cut dangerous air pollution from cars & trucks. Encourage cycling, walking and better transport. Stop unaffordable new housing developments and support greener housing for all. Protect green spaces.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In 2015, Conservative candidates came first most - look what we got! But at least 6 people out of 10 did not vote Tory. All those votes were wasted.

issues.economy: An economy that works for everyone.
issues.environment: Tackling climate change through renewable energy. Clean air.
issues.governance: We need to change the voting system.
issues.socialWelfare: Fair rents and new homes for rents people can afford.

housing.content: Stop unaffordable new housing developments. Support greener housing for all.

images.caption: Leaflet from Ruth Cadbury's 'Progressive Alliance' campaign promoting cooperation between Green Party and Labour in the Brentford and Isleworth constituency for the 2017 general election.
